summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/10/20 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Marc Evans'], 'Producers': ['DRG'], 'Starring': ['Martin Clunes', 'Katie Lyons', 'Claudie Blakley'], 'Studio': ['Acorn TV']} Review Text: Crime Investigation at it's best! Review Title: Riveting and Intelligent TV Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/12/04 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (España) [descripción de audio]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España) [CC]', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Alberto Ruiz Rojo', 'Patricia Font', 'Guillem Morales'], 'Producers': ['José María Caro', 'Ignacio Corrales', 'Nacho Manubens', 'Sonia Martínez', 'Tadeo Villalba hijo'], 'Starring': ['Leonor Watling', 'Rafael Novoa', 'Nathaniel Parker'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: English speakers, I urge to you watch in Spanish with English subtitles so as to not miss the rich accents of the actual actors, and not the rather awful English dubbing (the sync is OK, but the voices don't match the faces at all and it's very distracting). Beautifully filmed and the edit work depicting 20 years of time passing in Episode 1 is outstanding. A really wonderful story about two people destined to be together. Well worth the time investment! Review Title: Beautiful Story, Hoping for a second season Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2023/01/22 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Oh Chung-hwan'], 'Producers': ['Jong Byeong Bae', 'Kim Eun Yeong', 'Ji Su Jeon', 'Young Ok Lee'], 'Starring': ['Ji-eun Lee', 'Yeo Jin-gu', 'Shin Jeong-geun'], 'Studio': ['CJ ENM']} Review Text: Right from the first episode this one grabbed me and would not let me go until I'd watched the very last episode and even then not until I'd watched the whole thing a second time just to make sure I hadn't missed anything. From the gorgeous sets and characters to the creative story lines, from the profound revelations to the fact that almost no assumption you will make is what really happened, this series is surprising, endearing and utterly amazing.

As an American who doesn't speak a word of Korean I was still able to thoroughly enjoy this epic sweeping tale of drama, comedy, romance, loss, tragedy, penance, redemption, comradery and so much more (though the first time through I did use 10 sec. rewind a LOT to be able to absorb some of the longer subtitling). Review Title: A Sweeping Epic Tale Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2023/02/08 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Wang Jun'], 'Starring': ['Zhou Xun', 'Huo Jianhua'], 'Studio': ['NewTV']} Review Text: Imagine your favorite historical mini-series (usually 6-8 episodes), the one where you wanted it to slow down so you could drink in the beauty of the costumes, scenery, hairstyles and decorations; where you were so sad because it was over? Now imagine you get it all.. every detail, nuance and 'how did they do that'? I cannot tell you how many times I hit pause to admire set decoration, elaborate hair and amazing clothing. 87 episodes and I never tired of it even a little bit. The story itself is beautiful, tragic, triumphant, devastating and oddly hopeful and quite likely a true depiction of the very real dangers inside an Imperial Court. I have never shed so many tears and yet, I will be forever grateful I saw this one! Review Title: This may be the best series I've ever seen! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality, emotionally engaging narratives, particularly within the drama genre. Their purchase history reveals a consistent appreciation for complex storytelling that interweaves elements of romance, loss, and redemption, often with unexpected plot twists. The sentiment expressed in reviews is overwhelmingly positive, with multiple instances of perfect ratings indicating a deep attachment to the content.

In terms of thematic preferences, the person favors international productions featuring nuanced performances, evidenced by a willingness to watch films in different languages with subtitles, enhancing the authenticity of the experience. They exhibit an enthusiasm for visually stunning presentations, emphasizing intricate details in set and costume design, which suggests a preference for immersive storytelling.

Quality ratings hover around 4.4 to 4.7, suggesting a standard for excellence, while their repeated use of terms like "riveting," "beautifully filmed," and "epic" highlights a desire for both aesthetic and narrative quality. Price sensitivity appears moderate; they are likely willing to invest time and possibly money into long-form series if highly rated, as suggested by extensive engagement with multiple episodes.

Overall, core preferences center on high-quality, impactful storytelling that transcends cultural boundaries, rich visual artistry, and a fondness for compelling character development within their chosen genres.

target_interaction.title: Beautiful story of brilliant heroes!
target_interaction.text:
Captivating from beginning to end and a marvelous history lesson of the Liao Dynasty in general. The weaving of what may have been fictional romance into the lives of people that actually existed make you hope that this is the way it really happened. No hero is perfect, no villain is without a redeeming quality. Power that is so often corrupting in hands of the weak is wielded with wisdom and temperance until force is the only option. The acting is simply FANTASTIC!

Unless you are a very fast reader you are likely going to have to hit pause quite a bit to read the subtitles. They are great with getting the point across but several Asian spoken words simply don't have equivalent English adaptations so more modern words that those in use at the time have been substituted.
